snippet: Justin Gatlin won the 100 meters at the Golden Gala in Rome for a second straight year, and Mutaz Essa Barshim of Qatar set a meet record in topping a high-class high jump.
abstract: American sprinter Justin Gatlin wins the 100 meters at the Golden Gala in Rome for a second straight year.
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin won the 100 meters at the Golden Gala in Rome for a second straight year, and Mutaz Essa Barshim of Qatar set a meet record in topping a high-class high jump.

headline.main: Gatlin Wins 100 Meters in Rome Again
